name: We the Girls: Shall we date?/ Once upon a time...
name_original: We the Girls: Shall we date?/ Once upon a time...
description:
We the Girls: Shall we date?/ Once upon a time... is an adventure game developed by NTT Solmare.
You can play We the Girls: Shall we date?/ Once upon a time... on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
